name: Stock & Stein
description:
«Stock & Stein» is a short and relexing ‹endless-runner› wherein you play a child that is running though a forest.

The goal of the game is to reach the scenic lake, and as children like to play games you can only reach it when avoiding to hit any obstacle in the way for 1 minute.

The game narration is in German but only acts as minimal flavor text, and can therefore be enjoyed by non-German players as well.

Navigation:

Menu — Left Click
Jumping — Space
